message.entry: Terminator must be a scalar or 1x2 cell array.
StringClient transport object must be connected using transport CONNECT.
Error reading String.\nTimeout occurred before String read operation completed.
Read cannot be called while receiving data via a callback function. To disable the callback set obj.StringReadFcn = [];
Error reading String.\nTimeout occurred waiting for the String Terminator.
Error assigning ''{0}''. ''{0}'' must be of type matlabshared.transportclients.internal.StringClient.StringClient.
